## US Charts

```{r}
raw_data <- read.csv("https://opendata.ecdc.europa.eu/covid19/casedistribution/csv"
                     , na.strings = "", fileEncoding = "UTF-8-BOM")
max_date <- max(as.Date(raw_data$dateRep, format="%d/%m/%Y"))
```
